ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) && NOT(OR( $Profile.Name == 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name == 'Adminitrator Sistem', $Profile.Name = 'Supervisor-AMFS', $Profile.Name = 'Other Dept AMFS')) && RecordType.Name = 'Welcome Call'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Hanya Supervisor yang bisa melakukan "Change Owner"
